review: I'm normally not a fan of Roku boxes or Apple boxes, but I would have to say with my Amazon Prime membership I find that the stick is the perfect solution for my family. We are able to watch netflix, hulu plus and amazon prime with no problem. We also are able to use the app to control the fire stick from our smartphones or using the remote. I would recommend to anyone that doesn't want another box , but would rather have something hidden.
